flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: This project requires some circuit building ability though, and is not a good idea for a starter project. My Simple Halloween Guillotine project, however, is. This project costs about $50 all told, mostly from the cost of the EL wire.

guide.summary: This is a cool costume that i used on halloween.  It is my entry to the electronics section of the 2011 halloween competition.  It uses two colors of EL wire that it flashes with music from any line-level input (such as an ipod or mp3 player).
guide.title: EL wire color organ tron-style costume.
